This will be helpful for finding and canceling subscriptions but also when a credit card is closed because of fraud so you can convert everything over.  Use the JS SDK.  Let's use React for the front-end.  Let's keep it pretty simple.
Let use OAuth to avoid having to use a PAT.  Look at https://github.com/ynab/ynab-api-starter-kit for an example of how to implement OAuth.
